mapper.select: select qnaid, u.username, qnatitle, qnacontent, qnadate, qnaimage, qnaAttachType, qnaAttachFileName, productName from qna q inner join userinfo u on q.userid = u.userid left join product p on p.productid = q.productid
mapper.update: update qna set qnatitle=#{qnaTitle}, qnacontent=#{qnaContent} where qnaid=#{qnaId}
